content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a legal case that took place in antwerp on may 27th 2015 the procedure lasted for 2 years and 11 months the judgment covers various aspects of matrimonial property law liquidationdivision procedures and fraudulent transfers of assets it confirms the application of specific laws and principles including the preferential allocation of the family home in cases of joint ownership the court finds that fraudulent transfers of assets occurred between companies owned by the parties involved and emphasizes the need for a fair valuation and investigation of these transfers in divorce proceedings the judgment reserves the appointment of a replacement notaryliquidator pending a ruling from the constitutional court the case involves parties referred to as jm w c l and b vdb with their respective advocates the applicable law is the law of august 13 2011 the court confirms the preferential allocation of the family home and the possibility of dividing undivided property even in cases of spouses married under a statutory system the court also finds mismanagement in a previous judgment from the commercial court the case involves a divorce granted to the husband based on adultery a liquidation division has been appointed to determine the possible divisions of the property and arrange for a public sale the court ruled on various issues including the distribution of assets the valuation of shares in a company and the replacement of the estate notary the husband appealed the decision and the court referred a question regarding the admissibility of the appeal to the constitutional court the court will consider the arguments and make a decision on the division of the family home and the valuation of shares in a bankrupt company
